medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 4 days ago with persistent abdominal pain for 2 days initially reported at a different facility, accompanied by nausea, vomiting, and intolerance to oral intake. Patient endorsed chills but denied fevers. No constipation or urinary symptoms were reported. Last bowel movement was normal. The patient had worsening but did not follow up until returning for further evaluation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Total hysterectomy and bladder suspension (Transabdominal), previous open inguinal hernia repair. No significant past medical history.
